Package index

All functions

available_configs()
Show available precomputed configurations
comp_rmse()
Compute RMSE of Parameters
get_sspLNIRT()
Get an sspLNIRT.object from the precomputed sspLNIRT data
optim_sample()
Optimize for Sample Size
plot_RA()
Plot the simulated response accuracy data
plot_RT()
Plot the simulated response time data
plot_power_curve()
Plot the power curve from sample size optimization
plot_estimation()
Plot the estimation metrics of the item parameters

Print summary for summary.sspLNIRT.object
rhat_LNIRT()
Rhat for LNIRT objects
run_app()
Run the Shiny Application
sspLNIRT.data
Precomputed sample size planning results
summary(<sspLNIRT.object>)
Summarize a sspLNIRT.object
